Getting startedÂ¶

First of all, download the source code of the Matlab toolbox.

Source code is hosted at Github.

Then, run the Matlab script path_management.m, in order to set search paths for Matlab.

Finally, run one of these GUIs to play with the toolbox.

Name of GUI Features Matlab function
Demo This main GUI is used to run other GUIs demo.m
EBSD map GUI This GUI is used to analyze slip transmission across GBs for an EBSD map A_gui_plotmap.m
Bicrystal GUI This GUI is used to analyze slip transfer in a bicrystal A_gui_plotGB_Bicrystal.m
preCPFE_SX This GUI is used to preprocess the CPFE model for SX indentation A_femproc_windows_indentation_setting_SX.m
preCPFE_BX This GUI is used to preprocess the CPFE model for BX indentation A_femproc_windows_indentation_setting_BX.m
